features.name: Signature-Based Detection
features.description: Detect known attacks by matching patterns in network traffic.

features.name: Anomaly-Based Detection
features.description: Detect unknown attacks by identifying traffic patterns that deviate from the norm.

features.name: Real-Time Alerting
features.description: Provide immediate alerts when potential threats are detected.

features.name: Logging and Reporting
features.description: Log detected attacks and generate periodic reports for analysis.

features.name: False Positive Reduction
features.description: Minimize the number of false positives to reduce unnecessary alerts.

features.name: Integration with SIEM
features.description: Seamlessly integrate with Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) systems.

non_functionalities.name: Performance
non_functionalities.description: Ensure the IDS processes network traffic efficiently without causing delays.

non_functionalities.name: Scalability
non_functionalities.description: The system should scale with increasing network traffic and complexity.

non_functionalities.name: Reliability
non_functionalities.description: The IDS must operate continuously without crashes or downtime.

non_functionalities.name: Security
non_functionalities.description: The IDS system must itself be secure from attacks or compromises.

non_functionalities.name: Maintainability
non_functionalities.description: The system should be easy to maintain, update, and configure.

non_functionalities.name: Compliance
non_functionalities.description: Adhere to industry-specific regulations like GDPR, HIPAA, etc.
